LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperLowСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - super-low
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperLowСarryCapacity.descript:
I hope you can at least wear your own underwear?
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLowСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - very low
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLowСarryCapacity.descripti:
Carriers of this gene have a very low carrying capacity.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_LowСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - low
LanguageData.XMonsters_LowСarryCapacity.description:
Carriers of this gene have a low carrying capacity.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_HighСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - high
LanguageData.XMonsters_HighСarryCapacity.description:
Carriers of this gene have a high carrying capacity.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryHighСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - very high
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryHighСarryCapacity.descript:
Carriers of this gene have a very high carrying capacity.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperHighСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - super-high
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperHighСarryCapacity.descrip:
I wonder where they keep so many things and ammunition?
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ArchoСarryCapacity.label: carry capacity - archo-high
LanguageData.XMonsters_ArchoСarryCapacity.description:
It seems that the pockets of those who carry this gene are transformed into almost separate distorted dimensions.
<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>
This gene will be fully revealed if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
